SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

Interface RmiConnectionController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiConnectionServerController
public interface RmiConnectionController extends Remote
RMI remotable service clients can use to establish a connection with the server

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    RmiConnectionController.ConnectedController
    RMI remotable service exclusive to a single authenticated client which can be used by said client to join games

    Field
    Description

    Remote name used to identify RmiConnectionController in a Registry

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RmiConnectionController.ConnectedController
    doConnect(String nick, RmiHeartbeatHandler heartbeatHandler)
    Initiates the handshake process with the other party, providing a nickname to be used as an identifier and a means of keeping the connection alive
    String
    getClientAddressHost()
    Returns the host address of the client invoking this method remotely

  • Field Details

    • REMOTE_NAME

      static final String REMOTE_NAME
      Remote name used to identify RmiConnectionController in a Registry
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getClientAddressHost

      String getClientAddressHost() throws RemoteException
      Returns the host address of the client invoking this method remotely

      This can be used by clients to discover which address (and therefore which network interface) can successfully communicate with the other party, and therefore bind stuff on that address

      Returns:
      the host address of the client invoking this
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if anything fails and the connection is lost

    • doConnect

      RmiConnectionController.ConnectedController doConnect(String nick, RmiHeartbeatHandler heartbeatHandler) throws RemoteException, NickNotValidException
      Initiates the handshake process with the other party, providing a nickname to be used as an identifier and a means of keeping the connection alive
      Parameters:
      nick - nick to be used as an identifier for this client
      heartbeatHandler - means of keeping the connection alive and detecting potential disconnects
      Returns:
      the remote service exclusive to this player which can be used to join games
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if anything fails and the connection is lost
      NickNotValidException - if the nick is already in use by another player
